props.name: color
props.descriptions: Define the text's color. Default is the global media primary color.

props.name: textAlign
props.descriptions: Define the horizontal alignement of text

props.name: fontFamily
props.descriptions: Define the font family. Default is the global media font family.

props.name: fontSize
props.descriptions: Define the size of the text. Should include the unit like '16px' or '2em'.
